alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 2:43PM CDT until May 25 at 8:53AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek near Owasso-Mingo affecting Tulsa County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek at Avant affecting Osage County. Bird Creek near Sperry affecting Osage and Tulsa Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bird Creek at Avant. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, agricultural lands along the Bird Creek floodplain downstream from Avant may experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 17.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
